amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure public health is taken into account by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency before law goes into effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 114-453 to ensure public health is taken into account by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency before law goes into effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Veasey amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 234 (Roll no. 121).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Veasey amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 234 (Roll no. 121).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Veasey.
